abstract: After a decade of watching newspapers and rival wire services shrink, The Associated Press is refitting itself to handle the 24-hour news cycle it helped create.
snippet: After a decade of watching newspapers and rival wire services shrink, The Associated Press is refitting itself to handle the 24-hour news cycle it helped create.
lead_paragraph: After a decade of watching newspapers and rival wire services shrink, The Associated Press, the 161-year-old news cooperative, is refitting itself to handle the 24-hour news cycle it helped create.

headline.main: A.P. to Reorganize Work and Accent Multimedia
headline.print_headline: A.P. to Reorganize Work And Accent Multimedia
